name: 王正豪
objective: 本課程之設計，在介紹學生資訊安全的概念，並瞭解相關的技術與應用。本課程包括下列主題：資訊安全簡介、傳統加密法、私鑰加密技術、公鑰加密技術與雜湊函數、訊息認證編碼與協定、認證系統、電子郵件安全技術、網際網路協定安全技術、全球資訊網安全技術、系統安全技術、防火牆系統等。
schedule:
Introduction (Ch.1): 1-2 wks
Cryptography (Ch.2-3): 3-4 wks 
Network security applications (Ch.4-9): 7-8 wks
- selected topics: TCP/IP, Web, SSH, E-mail, IP security
System security (Ch.10-12): 1-2 wks
- selected topics: Password, virus, intrusion detection, firewall
scorePolicy:
Homework assignments: ~30%
Midterm exam and quiz: ~35%
Term projects: ~35%
materials:
Textbook: Network Security Essentials: Applications and Standards, 5th ed., by William Stallings, Pearson Education, Inc., 2013.
References: 
Cryptography and Network Security: Principles and Practice, Sixth Edition, by William Stallings, Prentice-Hall, 2013 (from which our textbook is adapted)
Slides, documents, and tools on the course website: http://www.ntut.edu.tw/~jhwang/IS/
